name: [Read Network] Early Reading Series Read Easy Phonics Beginner Level - 8 Jilid
description:
ReadEasy Phonics Reading Series - Beginner Level - consists of 8 books. The reading texts are graded based on the sounds introduced in each book.

It begins with individual sounds where each sound is represented by the most common symbol or spelling.

After introducing a few sounds then words are introduced based on the sounds taught. Children will start reading three-letter words like 'cat' and 'bat' then will move on to read four-letter words such as 'mast' and 'stop' by blending the sounds in words.

It is systematically produced, with meaningful texts  and  illustrations, the books are designed to help young emergent readers to master reading skills  and build the confidence of beginner readers, and to motivate and inspire children who find reading difficult or troublesome.


The books are carefully graded and from one level to the next, there is a gradual but clear progression in terms of sounds, words, story length, sentence structure and vocabulary.

Supported by experts - The Writers

The series has been written by Nik Eliani Nik Nawi and Othman Ahamad who have been known to published the Malay Reading Series - Bacalah Anakku - which is also based on phonics. They were also appointed as the phonics consultants for the writings of English Year 1 and Year 2 Text Books used by the Ministry of Education Malaysia in 2010-2011.

Between them, they have conducted hundreds of courses on how to teach reading based on phonics, synthetic phonics in particular, to parents, teachers, trainers and school administrators.


It is also supported by a VCD which contains the sounds taught in the series, pronunciation guides and letter cards.

Titles:
-lower case letters
A wipe clean book for preschoolers full of friendly monsters to help children to write lower case letters. Pen control activities such as adding straight stalks to daffodils or curly antennae to an insect help children practice the shape of each letter in the alphabet, and the special wipe clean pen can be used again and again.

-holiday activities
A wipe clean book full of holiday themed activities to help young children develop their counting, observations and pen control skills. Each page has a different holiday scene with activities such as counting shell, drawing petterbs in the sails of a boat and decorating suitcases. The wipe clean pages and special pen provide lots of opportunities to practice as children can return their favorite activities again and again. A fun and engaging way for young children to learn and develop essential skills.

-under the sea activities
-travel activities 

-Get ready for school-Number to copy
This colourful Wipe Clean Book is full of friendly animals learning to write numbers. Young children will enjoy drawing over the outlines of 5 mice doing some digging, boats shaped like the number 4 and more, learning key counting, ordering and pen control skills along the way. The wipe clean pages means this book can be enjoyed again and again.

-Get ready for school-counting
A colourful Wipe Clean Activity book to help young children learn how to count to 20 and write their numbers. The simple number activities are great for learning key counting, ordering and pen control skills and the pages are wipe clean so children can practice again and again.

-space activities 
Spot the differences between space suits, find shooting stars, join the digs in a space station and much more int Be is out of this world activities book. 

-start spelling 
A colourful Wipe Clean activity book that helps young children start learning how to spell. Each page has words to trace and spaces to write the words, helping children gain confidence in spelling simple words. Great for practicing pen control, and the pages are wipe-clean so children can practice again and again. 
 
-garden activities 
This fun book is a perfect way for young children to develop their counting, observation and pen control skills. They can spot matching birds, decorate a watering can, count apples in an orchard and lots more. Durable, wipe clean pages mean children can revisit their favorite activities again and again.

-capital letters 
A wipe clean book full of friendly monsters to help children learn to write capital letters. Pen control activities such as tracing the wings of a butterfly or drawing waves for monsters to surf in help children practice the shape of each letters, and the special wipe clean pen means activities can be done again and again.

description:

Books are never be enough for children!
PRICELESS INVESTMENT!

Format Board book | 10 pages
Dimensions 182 x 182 x 18mm | 315g

Introducing Bizzy Bear ! With chunky sliders to push and pull, these robust little board books are perfect for active toddlers. Rich in visual detail and with touches of humour, they are set to become firm favourites in the family library.

Put your child's favorite topics into action by moving the tabs on the pages of these extra thick board books, cleverly designed to stimulate sensory development and fine motor coordination, while surviving daily use by active babies and toddlers! 

They are also really quick and repetitive reads, making them great first books for children to memorize!  

Book titles: -
Fire Rescue
Bizzy Bear is lending a hand at the fire station when he receives an emergency call summoning the team's help. Join the fire-fighters as they race to the rescue in this action-packed story for the very young!

Space Rocket
Bizzy Bear and his crew of intrepid astronauts are taking a trip into outer space! All little readers will love to join in with the countdown, repeat the rhyme and use the chunky mechanisms to launch the rocket into space.

Dinosaur Safari
On a visit to the Dinosaur Wildlife Park, Bizzy Bear discovers some interesting footprints. Where do they lead and to which dinosaur do they belong? Another exciting adventure for the world's most intrepid bear!

Farmyard Fun
Bizzy Bear is off to help out on the farm. Toddlers can help him count the ducks, feed the pigs and find the eggs before he waves bye-bye. Bizzy Bear books are perfect for little hands, with lots of chunky things to push and pull.

Happy Holiday
Bizzy Bear's going on holiday, but he has to take a taxi, then a train, then a plane before he arrives at the beach and can set sail on his boat. Another fun slider book with lots to see and do - perfect for vehicle-mad toddlers everywhere!

DIY Day
Bizzy Bear has a very special DIY project planned, and he needs lots of tools and help to get the job done. Young children will love helping Bizzy and all his friends measure, hammer, saw, and paint. But whatever can they be making? An ingeniously designed book with a fun surprise ending.

name: Koleksi Majalah Ana Muslim (10-14 tahun) Buku Cerita Majalah Komik Kanak-kanak Ana Muslim
description:
INFO / SINOPSIS
Majalah Ana Muslim

Majalah Ana Muslim dengan tagline Membentuk Peribadi Mulia, menghimpunkan pelbagai kisah menarik yang sesuai dengan pengalaman dan memenuhi tuntuan psikologi kanak-kanak yang bakal memasuki alam awal remaja!

Sarat dengan kepelbagaian kisah yang menyentuh topik persahabatan, sukan, dan isu-isu semasa, ia juga turut diselitkan dengan unsur-unsur humor dan fiksyen. Tidak ketinggalan, penekanan aspek keagamaan serta nilai murni yang menjadi soroton utama pembinaan karakter dan penceritaan telah mengangkat ia sebagai majalah Islami terbaik buat pembacaan kanak-kanak Malaysia! Bahkan, setiap pemilihan dan kupasan topik yang diutarakan mampu menjadi panduan dan penanda aras bagi kanak-kanak dalam  mengasah kemahiran berfikir dan membuat pertimbangan serta membantu mereka menavigasi kehidupan selari dengan ajaran Islam. Ia diseimbangkan lagi dengan kolum-kolum yang bersifat akademik dan kreatif bagi membantu guru-guru dalam menyediakan bahan bacaan yang lengkap ketika di sekolah. 

Dengan setiap helaian muka surat yang berwarna, majalah ini sangat sesuai untuk anak-anak yang berusia 10 – 14 tahun!

Jangan tunggu lagi, mari dapatkan Majalah Ana Muslim sekarang!

Books are never be enough for children!

See Under the Sea
A fabulous flap book with over 80 flaps to lift and extra pages to open up to explore life under the sea. Shows coral reefs teeming with fish, the icy waters of the Arctic and the dizzying depths of ocean trenches, and shipwrecks and pirate booty too. Flaps reveal extra facts, information and surprises.

How Your Body Work
Lift the flaps to uncover the amazing inner workings of your very own body – from your bones, blood and brain to the bacteria in your belly button. Discover what happens when you eat, how your senses work, what your heart and lungs do and lots more fascinating facts. With links to specially selected websites for activities and videos about the human body.

About Weather
What are rainbows made of? How hot is the sun? When do hurricanes happen? Discover the answers to these questions and many more in this fascinating information book, with over 60 flaps to lift. There’s also a quiz, a make your own water cycle experiment, and Usborne Quicklinks to specially selected websites for more amazing facts.

About Science
An interactive book with over 60 flaps revealing answers to all kinds of questions about science. Children can lift the flaps to discover the answers to questions such as How do bodies grow? Why do astronauts float? Where does lightning strike? and lots more. Includes links to carefully selected websites with even more answers to simple science questions.

About World
A beautifully illustrated, geography book full of flaps to lift to find answers questions such as “When can I see a shooting star?”, “Where is the tallest waterfall?”, and “What are clouds made of?”.
Over 50 flaps to lift answer who, what, when, why and where questions about the weather and seasons, countries and languages around the world, what the Earth is made of and lots more.

About Food
This mouth-watering book answers all kinds of questions about food. With over 60 flaps to lift children can discover which foods grow in rainforests, who discovered potatoes, why cheese smells and lots more where, how, why, what, which and yes or no questions. Packed with amazing facts and useful information this is a great way to learn about food.

The Kingdom of Fantasy is a wonderful series. There’s clear distinctions of good versus evil, clear consequences of sin, and the hero is frequently scared but does the right thing anyway.
